title: wizzy9514
author: wizzy9514
content: Hosting AMAS efficiently is one of the key marketing strategy that most people underestimate. Hosting AMA is great but speaking convincingly will raise fire in the bones of your listeners to invest in your project even if they didn't want to. I speak with assurance about your project to attract great investors.The projects I've done this for have been able conduct a successful presale and fairlaunch..Most significantly was az-world who filled their private sale in less than 2 seconds.if you are wondering about how much I charge, don't panic as I want you to be successful and I charge when I'm done with each ama.I will do what I know how to do best for you.telegram @bossofcrypt

comments.author: wizzy9514
comments.body: STILL VERY ACTIVE ..I WORK BEFORE PAYMENT IF YOU HAVE TRUST ISSUES
